summary: Comprehensive testing completed for multiplayer Tic-Tac-Toe application. All backend APIs (18/18) and frontend features working perfectly. Tested username entry, local/online game modes, gameplay mechanics, win detection, replay system, stats, history, and navigation.
passed_tests: Backend API endpoints (18/18 passed)
Homepage loading with username input form
Username entry and player creation
Game mode selection (Local 2-Player and Online Multiplayer buttons)
Local game creation and gameplay
Making moves on the board (all 9 cells clickable)
Win detection with winning line highlighting (X wins top row)
Game completion with winner announcement
Rematch functionality button appears after game ends
View Replay button functionality
Replay page with comprehensive controls (play/pause/step forward/back)
Replay timeline navigation and move history
Stats page showing correct empty state and statistics
History page showing match history
Online lobby page with game creation
WebSocket connectivity (Connected status visible)
Navigation between all pages (Home, Stats, History, Game, Replay, Lobby)
Player statistics tracking and persistence
Game state persistence and API integration
Responsive design and clean UI
